title: How to program a dish remote control on a Samsung TV - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the remote. 2x.x remotes, press and hold tv button until all mode lights come on, then punch on 601# or 684#.Try volume button after first code, if it works then you’re done.I’d you don’t have a 20.x or 21.x Remote then reply with what Remote you have and I can tell you how to program it. Or you can look at this page and follow the instructions. https://www.mydish.com/support/products/remotes/how-to/program-to-tvother

Hi, You have to find the code of the Samsung TV and use it in the Dish remote control. There are step by step instructions online with Dish and Samsung. You may need to know the model of the Dish remote and the model of the TV as well. It can be a long process so try to have Dish do it first over the phone, then attempt it online yourself, and if that doesn’t work, you can get a universal remote for both. Good luck!
